summary:
Media and entertainment lawyer with 4+ years of in-house legal experience, including video/audio content production, licensing and distribution, and intellectual property law. I have an extensive background in film, TV & podcasts, and a current wheelhouse of :

• Social Media Content 
• Podcasts
• Brand Engagement, and
• Talent & Influencers.

Australian-qualified lawyer, now based in Singapore! Feel free to contact me at kelng.aw@gmail.com for more info.
